enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: In his final speech in a high-level segment, UNFCCC Executive Secretary Michael Zammit Cutajar congratulated the Secretariat staff on their dynamism and commitment, and thanked Parties for their trust and for not engaging in micro-management.
Noting that this treaty relates to sustainable development of the global economy as well as climate change, he wished delegates well in moving the UNFCCC forward.
Delegates thanked him for his contribution with a standing ovation.
